media:group.media:description:
Twitch Channel (Streams Mon/Wed/Fri 8pm EST): https://www.twitch.tv/Lythero Zyzx_ (Gary's) Twitch Channel: https://twitch.tv/Zyzx_ IHeartJustice (Javi's) Twitch Channel: https://twitch.tv/IHeartJustice IHeartJustice's YT Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1HYC09qjVy-F3Kibq_ZSnQ
Merch: https://lythero-shop.fourthwall.com/collections/all
Shirts, Posters, Thumbnail & hilarious screaming Videl/Roshi/16/Gogeta art by Krooked Glasses: https://twitter.com/Krooked_Glasses
Tiny X-men audio animation of the Gokus by Pringus McDingus: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ8Nk1VgyMgM7Mx3sX8WhPw
Music: Dragonball Z - The Saga Continues: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MYK_QqH-BXk Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories - Free Duel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qsecA6w5jg Ghost Fight!! - Menu Theme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JAwZbja0U_A Marvel vs Capcom 2 - Carnival Stage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AwkPvrH6AT8 +TEK - Heptagon: https://soundcloud.com/plrusek-chan/heptagon Sonic Adventure - Game Over: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hw-Hcn7oJBs North Pole Star 2 - Looney Tunes Space Race: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R7QiNOzV-X0 Lazerbat - Punk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9sWo-3qEa68 Skeleton Boomerang - Big-Boned Gentleman: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=656b-Zp5NuE No Straight Roads - Rocket Science: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5_y5qIbasFM No Straight Roads - All 3 DJ Sub-Atomic themes mashed (depending on who's winning at the time) Baseline: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ANCMbw7y-sg EDM (CPU winning): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MGcffB4vN_E Rock (Players winning): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LKNBOzazxZE

Mods Credits:
@UltIMa647: Optimus Prime Half Cut Frieza Margy (@UltimosVA too) Badman Deleto Blue, Gogeta Gun, Cooler Gun Patrick Star, Spongebob, Squidward Black Goku Black Matt (including M A T T N O I S E S) Waluigi Pepsiman (@ONI_3DArts too) Great Saiyaman

@TheDrawVoid Sonic

Thanks all of you for the AMAZING & hilarious mods. Let me know if any are missing on twitter!
